items.summary: Add an informational popup or alert banner in the AdminRegistration.tsx component that displays the message 'Only admin can assign user roles' when a user attempts to register an admin principal, explaining that admin registration requires existing admin authorization (except for the first admin setup)

Update the AdminRegistration.tsx component to display the 'Unauthorized: Only admins can assign user roles' error message more prominently as a modal popup or alert dialog instead of just showing it in a toast notification, making it clear to users that they lack the required admin permissions
